item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 14, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Red Hat to contribute container tech (Podman, bootc, ComposeFS...) to CNCF (75 points | 9 comments)

7. Keycloak took 10 months to fix a 2FA bypass (164 points | 66 comments)

9. MindsDB (YC W20) Is Hiring an Operations Analyst ( | hide)
10. PyPI now supports digital attestations (72 points | 34 comments)

27. Why is it so hard to find a job now? Enter Ghost Jobs (337 points | 438 comments)
28. Interview with gwern (229 points | 179 comments)
29. Quarry: A modern computing environment for your World (25 points | 4 comments)
